verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Sanctify<WH6942> to me all of the firstborn,<WH1060> whatever opens<WH6363> the womb<WH7358> among the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> both of man<WH120> and of animal.<WH929> It is mine."

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Remember<WH2142> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> in which you came out<WH3318> from Egypt,<WH4714> out of the house<WH1004> of bondage;<WH5650> for by strength<WH2392> of hand<WH3027> Yahweh<WH3068> brought you out<WH3318> from this place.<WH2557> No leavened bread shall be eaten.<WH398>
This day<WH3117> you go out<WH3318> in the month<WH2320> Abib.<WH24>

It shall be,<WH3068> when Yahweh shall bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> of the Canaanite,<WH3669> and the Hittite,<WH2850> and the Amorite,<WH567> and the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite,<WH2983> which he swore<WH7650> to your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> you,<WH776> a land flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> that you shall keep<WH5647> this service<WH5656> in this month.<WH2320>
Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened bread,<WH4682> and in the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> shall be a feast<WH2282> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

Unleavened bread<WH4682> shall be eaten<WH398> throughout the seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and no leavened bread<WH2557> shall be seen<WH7200> with you,<WH7603> neither shall yeast be seen<WH7200> with you,<WH1366> in all your borders.
You shall tell<WH5046> your son<WH1121> in that day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> <WH5668> 'It is because of that<WH2088> which Yahweh<WH3068> did<WH6213> for me when I came out<WH3318> of Egypt.<WH4714>'

It shall be for a sign<WH226> to you on your hand,<WH3027> and for a memorial<WH2146> between your eyes,<WH5869> that the law<WH8451> of Yahweh<WH3068> may be in your mouth;<WH6310> for with a strong<WH2389> hand<WH3027> Yahweh<WH3068> has brought you out<WH3318> of Egypt.<WH4714>
You shall therefore keep<WH8104> this ordinance<WH2708> in its season<WH4150> from year<WH3117> to year.<WH3117>
"It shall be,<WH3068> when Yahweh shall bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> of the Canaanite,<WH3669> as he swore<WH7650> to you and to your fathers,<WH1> and shall give it you,<WH5414>

that you shall set apart<WH5674> to Yahweh<WH3068> all that opens<WH6363> the womb,<WH7358> and every firstborn<WH6363> which you have that comes<WH7698> from an animal.<WH929> The males<WH2145> shall be Yahweh<WH3068>'s.

Every firstborn<WH6363> of a donkey<WH2543> you shall redeem<WH6299> with a lamb;<WH7716> and if you will not redeem<WH6299> it,<WH6202> then you shall break its neck; and you shall redeem<WH6299> all the firstborn<WH1060> of man<WH120> among your sons.<WH1121>

It shall be,<WH1121> when your son asks<WH7592> you in time to come,<WH4279> saying,<WH559> <WH559> 'What is this?' that you shall tell him,<WH2392> 'By strength of hand<WH3027> Yahweh<WH3068> brought us out<WH3318> from Egypt,<WH4714> from the house<WH1004> of bondage;<WH5650>

and it happened,<WH6547> when Pharaoh would hardly<WH7185> let us go,<WH7971> that Yahweh<WH3068> killed<WH2026> all the firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> both the firstborn<WH1060> of man,<WH120> and the firstborn<WH1060> of animal.<WH929> Therefore I sacrifice<WH2076> to Yahweh<WH3068> all that opens<WH6363> the womb,<WH7358> being males;<WH2145> but all the firstborn<WH1060> of my sons<WH1121> I redeem.<WH6299>'
It shall be for a sign<WH226> on your hand,<WH3027> and for symbols<WH2903> between your eyes:<WH5869> for by strength<WH2392> of hand<WH3027> Yahweh<WH3068> brought us out<WH3318> of Egypt.<WH4714>"

It happened,<WH6547> when Pharaoh had let the people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that God<WH7971> didn't<WH5148> lead them by the way<WH1870> of the land<WH776> of the Philistines,<WH6430> although<WH3588> that was near;<WH7138> for God<WH430> said,<WH559> "Lest perhaps the people<WH5971> change<WH5162> their minds when they see<WH7200> war,<WH4421> and they return<WH7725> to Egypt;<WH4714>"

but God<WH430> led<WH5437> the people<WH5971> around<WH5437> by the way<WH1870> of the wilderness<WH4057> by the Red<WH5488> Sea;<WH3220> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went up<WH5927> armed<WH2571> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the bones<WH6106> of Joseph<WH3130> with him,<WH7650> for he had made the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> swear,<WH7650> saying,<WH559> "God<WH430> will surely<WH6485> visit<WH6485> you,<WH5927> and you shall carry up my bones<WH6106> away from here with you.<WH5927>"
They took their journey<WH5265> from Succoth,<WH5523> and encamped<WH2583> in Etham,<WH864> in the edge<WH7097> of the wilderness.<WH4057>

Yahweh<WH3068> went<WH1980> before<WH6440> them by day<WH3119> in a pillar<WH5982> of cloud,<WH6051> to lead<WH5148> them on their way,<WH1870> and by night<WH3915> in a pillar<WH5982> of fire,<WH784> to give them light,<WH215> that they might go<WH3212> by day<WH3119> and by night:<WH3915>
the pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051> by day,<WH3119> and the pillar<WH5982> of fire<WH784> by night,<WH3915> didn't<WH4185> depart from before<WH6440> the people.<WH5971>
